CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Access_Type__c, "Periodic"), ( Aggregated_List_Price_Adjustment__c / Period_In_Months__c) ,
IF( ISPICKVAL(Access_Type__c, "Monthly"), (Aggregated_List_Price_Adjustment__c / 24) ,
( Aggregated_List_Price_Adjustment__c / 1) ) )
CustomField.label: Calculated List Price Adjustment
